publication.title: Repairing the Missing isa Structure of Ontologies
RepOSE: An Environment for Repairing Missing Ontological Structure
A System for Debugging Missing Isa Structure in Networked Ontologies
publication.jconf: Data Integration in the Life Sciences

publication.title: Using Partial Reference Alignments to Align Ontologies
Debugging the Missing IsA Structure of Networked Ontologies
SAMBO and SAMBOdtf Results for the Ontology Alignment Evaluation Initiative 2008
publication.keyword: Ontology Alignment;String Matching;Ontology Alignment Evaluation Initiative;
publication.abstract: This article describes a base system for ontology alignment, SAMBO, and an extension, SAMBOdtf. We present their results for the benchmark, anatomy and FAO tasks in the 2008 Ontology Alignment Evaluation Initiative. For the benchmark and FAO tasks SAMBO uses a strategy based on string matching as well as the use of a thesaurus. It obtains good results in many
